@Version(value="1.0")

Package com.adobe.granite.workflow.job

Main Granite Workflow API

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AbsoluteTimeoutHandler
    The AbsoluteTimeoutHandler is kind of a marker interface for absolute timeouts (timeout is happening at a specific date)
    AbsoluteTimeoutHandlerProxy
    Proxy to implementations of the AbsoluteTimeoutHandler interface
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExternalProcessJob
    Helper class to identify and create external process job events, identified by job topic ExternalProcessJob.JOB_TOPIC
    TimeoutJob
    The TimeoutJob class provides a utility for creating event triggered job used for programmed/scripted workflow steps.
    WorkflowJob
    The WorkflowJob class provides a utility for creating event triggered job used for programmed/scripted workflow steps.

Package com.adobe.granite.workflow.job Description

Main Granite Workflow API

Provides interfaces and types related to event triggered jobs.
